product_data.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops at night after cleansing

description.description:
```json
{
  "title": "AquaShield Niacinamide Serum: Unlock Oil-Control and Acne Reduction",
  "description": "AquaShield Niacinamide Serum is a concentrated serum designed to control oil production, reduce acne marks, and minimize pores. With 5% Niacinamide, this serum is perfect for oily and acne-prone skin types. By targeting the root causes of oiliness and acne, AquaShield Niacinamide Serum helps to achieve a smoother, more even-toned complexion.",
  "highlights": [
    "Controls oil production to prevent breakouts",
    "Reduces acne marks and hyperpigmentation",
    "Minimizes pores for a smoother complexion",
    "Contains 5% Niacinamide for effective results",
    "Suitable for oily and acne-prone skin types",
    "Helps to improve skin texture and tone"
  ],
  "usage_instructions": "Apply 2–3 drops of AquaShield Niacinamide Serum at night after cleansing. Gently massage into the skin until fully absorbed. Note: You may experience slight dryness during initial use, but this should subside as your skin adjusts to the product."
}
```
